name: UnifiedAttribute
description: A unified attribute for the Grapher

content.name: x
content.description:
the X position of the glowbox
default: 0.0

content.name: y
content.description:
the Y position of the glowbox
default: 0.0

content.name: angle
content.description:
the angle of the glowbox
default: 0.0

content.name: width
content.description:
the width of the button
default: 120.0

content.name: height
content.description:
the height of the button
default: 60.0

content.name: foreground_styles
content.description:
the line styles to be used for the foreground lines (the lines of the graph data)
This list is used in a "round-robin" fashion, meaning that the part will draw the first graph using the first style, the second using the second, etc. When the part runs out of styles to use, it will loop back to the start of the list.
default: a vector of 3 LineStyle default with the following adjustments for each
 - 0 : colour: {r:0.0, g:1.0, b:0.0, a:1.0}, thickness: 0.5
 - 1 : colour: {r:1.0, g:1.0, b:0.0, a:1.0}, thickness: 0.5
 - 2 : colour: {r:0.0, g:1.0, b:1.0, a:1.0}, thickness: 0.5

content.name: background_style
content.description:
the line style to use for the background graph lines (the measurement lines)
default LineStyle default with the following adjustments
 - colour: {r:0.0, g:0.39, b:0.0, a:1.0}
 - thickness: 0.25

content.name: background_text_style
background_horizontal_markings_x_position
content.description:
the x position for all of the background text markings in the horizontal direction
default: 0.5

content.name: background_horizontal_markings
content.description:
a vector of horizontal markings
default: a vector of 7 markings, using the default Marking with the following adjustments for each
 - 0 : position: (1.0 + 0.75) / 2.0 text: "0.75"
 - 1 : position: (1.0 + 0.5) / 2.0 text: "0.5"
 - 2 : position: (1.0 + 0.25) / 2.0 text: "0.25"
 - 3 : position: (1.0 + 0.0) / 2.0 text: "0.0"
 - 4 : position: (1.0 + -0.25) / 2.0 text: "-0.25"
 - 5 : position: (1.0 + -0.5) / 2.0 text: "-0.5"
 - 6 : position: (1.0 + -0.75) / 2.0 text: "-0.75"

content.name: background_vertical_markings_y_position
content.description:
the y position for all of the background text markings in the horizontal vertical
default: 0.5

content.name: background_vertical_markings
content.description:
a vector of horizontal markings
default: a vector of 7 markings, using the default Marking with the following adjustments for each
 - 0 : position: (1.0 + 0.75) / 2.0 text: "0.75"
 - 1 : position: (1.0 + 0.5) / 2.0 text: "0.5"
 - 2 : position: (1.0 + 0.25) / 2.0 text: "0.25"
 - 3 : position: (1.0 + 0.0) / 2.0 text: "0.0"
 - 4 : position: (1.0 + -0.25) / 2.0 text: "-0.25"
 - 5 : position: (1.0 + -0.5) / 2.0 text: "-0.5"
 - 6 : position: (1.0 + -0.75) / 2.0 text: "-0.75"

content.name: backing_colour
content.description:
the background colour
default: {r:0.2, g:0.2, b:0.2, a:1.0}
